title: Shawn Carpenter: A Cyber Vigilante
description: In 2003, Shawn Carpenter - an employee of Sandia National Laboratory - was at a crossroads: should he ignore a Chinese attack against U.S. targets, as his superiors ordered him to do - or do what he thinks is right, and continue investigating the case on his own?
